document_data.mainbody:
shawm or shaum was a double-reed instrument similar to an oboe. It was available for purchase through Auroras Whole Realms Catalogue.
Its sound was loud, shrill and buzzing. If played well, the sound of a shawm was clear and melancholic, reminiscent of migrating geese.
Shawms were common among gnomes of Faer√ªn, They were also used in Zakhara.
* The Bendekars Mercantile storehouse in Ravens Bluff had a variety of shawms in their instruments collection.
